description: This is a test class for integration testing the health endpoint of a Spring Boot application. It uses Spring's testing framework and JUnit 5 to verify that the '/health' endpoint responds with a status 'UP'.

classes.name: HealthIntegrationTest
classes.description: A Spring Boot test class that performs an integration test on the '/health' endpoint to confirm the application is UP.

methods.name: healthEndpoint
methods.description: Test method that calls the '/health' endpoint and asserts the response contains 'status':'UP'.
